alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Fayette; Forest; Greene; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 11 at 9:37PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of northwest, southwest, and west central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, in northwest Pennsylvania, Forest and Venango. In southwest Pennsylvania, Allegheny, Fayette, Greene, Washington and Westmoreland. In west central Pennsylvania, Armstrong, Butler, Clarion, Indiana and Jefferson PA. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. River or stream flows are elevated. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 937 PM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain has fallen across the area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Penn Hills, Monroeville, Greensburg, McKeesport, Indiana, Uniontown, Jeannette, Latrobe, Connellsville, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Vandergrift, Kittanning, Brookville, Marienville, Homer City, Apollo, Knox, Rimersburg and Plum. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Fayette; Forest; Greene; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango; Washington; Westmoreland
